unnormalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor REALLY Dating Again?!
normalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor Really Dating Again?!

unnormalised: Okay, Bollywood buffs, grab your chai and goss! Word on the street (and by street, we mean Instagram feeds) is that Ranbir Kapoor might be moving on after Alia! Sources are whispering about a possible "connection" with model Isha Sharma. They were supposedly spotted having dinner at "Olive" in Bandra on 10/06/2024 around 8:30 PM.
normalised: Okay, Bollywood buffs, grab your chai and goss! Word on the street (and by street, we mean Instagram feeds) is that Ranbir Kapoor might be moving on after Alia! Sources are whispering about a possible "connection" with model Isha Sharma. They were supposedly spotted having dinner at "Olive" in Bandra on tenth June two thousand and twenty four around eight thirty P.M.

unnormalised: Of course, it’s all just speculation right now. Remember the Katrina Kaif days? Good times!
normalised: Of course, it’s all just speculation right now. Remember the Katrina Kaif days? Good times!

unnormalised: Isha’s Insta has blown up since the rumour mill started churning, with comments like "RK spotted you!" popping up everywhere. Neither Ranbir's team nor Isha herself has commented.
normalised: Isha’s Insta has blown up since the rumour mill started churning, with comments like "R K spotted you!" popping up everywhere. Neither Ranbir's team nor Isha herself has commented.

unnormalised: But hold on, that’s not all! Eagle-eyed fans also pointed out that Isha was seen at a pre-wedding bash in Jodhpur last week (reportedly at 11:00 AM), the same one that the Kapoors reportedly attended on 05/06/2024. Coincidence? We think not! We're keeping our eyes peeled for more clues. Stay tuned for updates, folks! This is gonna be a spicy summer!
normalised: But hold on, that’s not all!
